<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home">530884bc835a76104acac396feaad3ae</macroponent><name>icon_1/now_default/icon</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
   const thisWeek = Number(api.data.aggregation_query_1.output.data.GlideAggregate_Query[0].count);
  const lastWeek = Number(api.data.aggregation_query_2.output.data.GlideAggregate_Query[0].count);

  if(thisWeek === lastWeek){
    return 'upload_yellow-circle-svgrepo-com.svg';
  }

  if(thisWeek > lastWeek){
    return 'upload_green-arrow-up-11385.svg';
    
  }else{
    return'upload_red-arrow-down-11380.svg';
  }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Omar</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-05 12:07:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>49c94734839232104acac396feaad369</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>icon_1/now_default/icon</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Facility Issue Reporting System " source="x_1850913_facili_0">1cf4c9a3833d32104acac396feaad3c1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Facility Issue Reporting System ">1cf4c9a3833d32104acac396feaad3c1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_49c94734839232104acac396feaad369</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Omar</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-05 12:07:27</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
